title: onde kUgaLate
sahitya:
onde kUgaLate vaikuNTha


anupallavi

  sandEhavillavO sAdhu sajjanarige


caraNam 1    sarasiyali Ane poreyendu kareyalu dvaritadi bandu kAida 
narahari krSNa salahendu cIralu taraLa prahlAdage kambhadindali banda
    caraNam 2    ambarISa dvAdashi vrata mADalu dombi mADida durvAsa muni 
kumbhinIpati krSNa kAyendu moreyiDe bembetti cakradim muni shApava kaLeda
    caraNam 3    drupada rAyana putriyApatta kaleyene krpeyinda akSayavinda tAnu 
kapaTa nATaka svAmi purandra viTTalana gupitadi nenevara vadana vaikuNTha
